description: This simple coffee and walnut cake makes a delicious tea time treat.
name: Coffee & Walnut Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 tbs instant coffee, dissolved in 1 tbs of boiling water

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a dry pan on medium heat and toast the walnut pieces for 2-3 minutes until fragrant. Set aside to cool. Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C.
Beat the butter, sugar, flour, eggs and coffee in a stand mixer until incorporated and smooth. Fold in the walnuts.
Scoop the batter into a lined loaf tin and bake on the middle oven shelf for 45-50 minutes, until a skewer comes out clean. Remove from the tin and cool completely on a wire rack.
Whisk the mascarpone, icing sugar and vanilla in a large bowl. Smooth the icing on top of the cake, decorate with extra walnuts if desired, slice and serve.
